title: All the countries I have lived

description:
A Map by Jlim

This map shows all the places I have lived ...

properties.name: Foxboro & Belleville, Ont Canada
properties.description: Posted by JlimBelleville, Ontario CanadaI lived here with during my high school years.

properties.name: I live here now!
properties.description: Posted by JlimWinter Garden, FL 34787

properties.name: Lincoln, NE - Union College
properties.description: Posted by JlimLincoln, NEAfter high school at Kingsway College, I left Canada for the first time to attend Union for one year.

properties.name: Nazareth, Israel
properties.description: Posted by JlimNazareth, IsraelAfter Union, I took one year off to teach English in Nazareth. (I barely spoke the lauguage then!) I had the most wonderful year of my life.

properties.name: Newbold College - 1985 to 88
properties.description: Posted by JlimBinfield, Berkshire UK

properties.name: Oak Park - 1993 to 1999
properties.description: Posted by JlimChicago, ILI worked in Chicago while studied for MBA @ Dominican University.

properties.name: SDA Language School - Bangkok 1992-93
properties.description: Posted by JlimÂ Bangkok, ThailandI was a Business Manager for the language school for 10 months -- just to help out! I had a great time!

properties.name: Saigon now Ho Chi Minh City
properties.description: Posted by JlimHo chi minh city, VietnamI was born here and lived the 1st 14 years of my life - Mostly during the Vietnam war, and a four years in the communist era.

properties.name: Somewhere, Indonesia Refugee Camps
properties.description: Posted by JlimPulau Galang, IndonesiaI fled VN in 3/79 on a boat and drifted to a small island belong to Indonesia. For the following next nine month, I was transfer to three other camps before moving to Canada. Someday, I\'d love to retrace those moves.

properties.name: Worked briefly here in summer of '86

properties.name: Worked here briefly in 2005 for Tsunami relief
